node.descriptionHTML:
1.0.0-beta.16 (2021-04-27)

Bug Fixes

  • artist: clear unused timers (4a4ef55)
  • artist: setInterval clear on re-render and add elements (bc48a8d)
  • lesy: remove unused code (986864b)
  • lesy-pilot-ui: update log for dynamic change (c0ef6ea)
  • lesy-plugin-artist: attach clear timers func and enable plugins support (7902313)
  • lesy-plugin-pilot: enable dynamic rewrite logs (9d2d2bd)

Features

  • captain: pilot desktop version (5ca0339)
  • core: add support for plugins plugin in config (5cea5f1)

1.0.0-beta.15 (2020-12-11)

Bug Fixes

  • lesy-pilot-ui: template binding fixes (031eb19)
  • lesy-pilot-ui: update help screen content (e67a2f7)

Features

  • artist: add new artist library (8eec4bd)
  • core: add middleware data in request object (cf62dba)
  • lesy-pilot-ui: add middlewares panel (8a83097)
  • lesy-plugin-artist: add artist plugin library (28bb3c9)
  • lesy-plugin-demo: add input command (829d658)
  • lesy-plugin-pilot: enable middlewares in request (2f874ec)

1.0.0-beta.14 (2020-11-01)

Note: Version bump only for package lesyjs

1.0.0-beta.12 (2020-10-25)

Note: Version bump only for package lesy

1.0.0-beta.11 (2020-10-14)

Bug Fixes

  • lesy-plugin-generator: windows path escaped in handlebars (a3c06aa)

1.0.0-beta.10 (2020-09-27)

Bug Fixes

  • compiler: default props is mutating when workspace is loaded (e625259)
  • compiler: merge user plugins with default plugins (5849d0f)
  • core: when command prop value is boolean is ignore in command (fa79825)
  • lesy-plugin-config: add missing setter function (51624dd)
  • lesy-plugin-pilot: isVisible prop typo (1aef711)
  • lesy-plugin-pilot: lookup for localstate instead of direct prop (0fabc18)

Features

  • lesy-pilot-ui: support to change console position (8be7b36)

Performance Improvements

  • compiler: improve loading performance (818163e)
  • core: refactor to improve performance (830198f)
  • lesy: run with TS in dev mode (f01ff28)
  • lesy-benchmark: update results (9aaca95)

1.0.0-beta.9 (2020-09-16)

Bug Fixes

  • lesy-plugin-pilot: lookup for localState when loading workspace projects (eb05fc9)

1.0.0-beta.7 (2020-08-24)

Bug Fixes

  • pilot-ui: workspacesuing same core module (c706094)

Performance Improvements

  • update benchmark results (c5dcd6e)

1.0.0-beta.6 (2020-08-19)

Bug Fixes

  • compiler: return print data when workspace is not enabled (c72ad16)
  • core: set default cmd and ignore files prefix with _ (fe9f781)
  • docs: update typos and modify terms (ee51225)
  • lesy: refactor scaffold templates (a2776cf)
  • lesy-plugin-sidekick: exit verison middleware gracefully (d7127f1)

Features

  • compiler: add support for workspace (add61ac)
  • core: add support to ignore files while providing dir (ff6b17f)
  • lesy: update templates for workspace support (49e2569)
  • lesy-pilot-ui: add workspace screen (70989b0)
  • lesy-plugin-pilot: support multiple projects (4b75655)

1.0.0-beta.5 (2020-06-22)

Note: Version bump only for package lesy

1.0.0-beta.4 (2020-06-21)

Note: Version bump only for package lesy

1.0.0-beta.3 (2020-06-17)

Bug Fixes

  • lesy-pilot-ui: allow optional required args (ca9952c)
  • lesy-plugin-validator: return middleware data (e462264)
  • validator: required rule not working when set to false (5f9ab1d)
